name: Double 0 Negative
description:
Fight your way through hordes of monsters and drink their blood... but not every type of blood is safe to drink.

Don't overindulge - it can be lethal!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/Arrow-Keys to move and melee-attack when moving into enemies
  • CTRL to drink blood  you're stading on (careful not to overfill)
  • LMB to spit out your stomach contents (more damage/rage the fuller you are)
  • E to descend a floor when standing on stairs

Made from scratch with no preexisting code, no engine used - just java and some libraries :)
